content:
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, have you tried breaking ore with a shovel, baa?
If you haven't, {短暂停}maybe it's best not to try~
The recoil could make you fall down and get hurt, baa-daa~
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持铲子闲聊（日常）-12绵朵_单一闲聊

content:
Digging is supposed to be quite the scholarly pursuit, baa-daa~
But when you're digging for treasure,
Most of the time all you find are holes, ew~

content: Just like how we often look for jobs to make a living, baa-daa~

content:
Baa-daa~ My grandma used to tell me when I was little,
that the shovel was actually a farming tool back then,
with a wide scoop perfect for spreading materials around~
